name: Lead The Galactic Destruction
description:
This game was made in less than 3 days as a submission to the Wowie Jam 4.0 (theme: Collaborate with AI), the Scorespace Jam #20 (theme: Absorb) and the Let's Talk Game Jam (no theme, but the title should fit the initials LTGD)!

Credits

Font, non UI graphics and some SFX by Kenney.

Music:

"Space Fighter Loop" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
